components.light

Class PointLightComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Component
      • components.light.DefaultLightComponent
        • components.light.PointLightComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IComponent, Light, PointLight, Invalidatable

    public class PointLightComponent
extends DefaultLightComponent
implements PointLight
    Basic implementation of a point light source.
    See Also:
    GameObject
